channel.title: Can I start Gateway and Workstation simultaneously?
channel.description: Cann I start gateway and workstation simultaneously or I need to wait until Gateway loads and updated and whonixcheck ends and only after that start Workstation?

item.title: Can I start Gateway and Workstation simultaneously?
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

you may start both the Gateway and Workstation simultaniously or seperatley.

Have a nice day,

Ego
